column5: Had a chance to get out on the Detroit River with a buddy and Bob Devine from Chartertalk guide service. Along with us and a few hundred other boats it was a slow morning until we cruised downriver towards the lake. Managed to boat at least 7 walleye and lost a couple others. The handliners caught the most fish from what we saw today and we did quite well considering it was a very slow day on the river. I also managed to get my new PB walleye at 6.5lbs. Thanks again Bob.
that one in the last pic is a beaut! nice goin' on the PB

nicely done guys!! bob is a great guy and knows his walleye! always a pleasure to spend a day on the water with him! sad i wasnt able to get out with him this spring though, but hopefully a fall trip is in the books!
